abstract: General Electric announced on Tuesday that it had agreed to purchase API Healthcare, a software and analytics firm that helps medical companies manage their work force.
snippet: General Electric announced on Tuesday that it had agreed to purchase API Healthcare, a software and analytics firm that helps medical companies manage their work force.
lead_paragraph: General Electric announced on Tuesday that it had agreed to purchase API Healthcare, a software and analytics firm that helps medical companies manage their work force.

headline.main: G.E. to Buy Health Care Analytics Firm
